title: Dungeon.Siege.II.Broken.World.Expansion-.ISO
description:
~ GoThIcHaCk.cOm PrEsEnTs ~

Name: DungeonSiege2: Broken World
Type: ISO
Site: http://www.DungeonSiege.com/
Full Name: "Dungeon Siege II: Broken World Expansion Install Disc & Play Disc"

-----
The game continues where Dungeon Siege II left off. As with DS2, Broken World takes place on the continent of Aranna. However the world has changed much following the fall of Valdis and the clash of the Sword of Zaramoth and the Shield of Azunai. The protagonist continues to pursue the Archmage who advised Valdis and masterminded much of what happened during Dungeon Siege II.
-----

Files are ISO files, so you need to mount it with Alcohol 120%, or any other software that can burn/mount. http://thepiratebay.se/search/alcohol%20120/0/99/300


~ GoThIcHaCk.cOm DreamHack ~
Final farewells; only in fairy tales.
